description: "Integrate your TuYa TS0601_switch_cover via Zigbee2MQTT with whatever smart home infrastructure you are using without the vendor's bridge or gateway."

<!-- Notes BEGIN: You can edit here. Add "## Notes" headline if not already present. -->
## Pairing
Press and release the middle (stop) button 5 times and hold for a 6th time until you hear a beep and see the light flashing.

<!-- Notes END: Do not edit below this line -->
